query: Create a commit for my staged changes
expected_behavior: Analyzes working tree with git status and git diff
Checks .gitignore for missing patterns based on project type
Scans staged files for potential secrets (API keys, passwords, private keys)
Reviews staging state and suggests related files to stage
Generates conventional commit message with type prefix
Uses imperative mood in subject line
Includes detailed body explaining what and why
Links file changes to what they accomplish
Asks for user confirmation before executing commit
